detaileddescription.para: SD- Card Single block write or read
Handle to store the main Command processor handle to be used by run-time event driven threads
OS thread handle for Application controller to be used by run-time blocking threads

briefdescription.para: Gives control to the Application controller.

detaileddescription.para: This is a template function where the user can write his custom application.

briefdescription.para: To enable the necessary modules for the application.
ThIS API uses the FAT file system library calls. This API will write and read files and it will compare the contents which has been written and read.

parameterdescription.para: - All the file operations are success
- when there is a mismatch in read and write buffer
- when file system write is failed
- when file system read is failed

briefdescription.para: Responsible for controlling the SD card example flow.

listitem.para: Check whether the storage medium (SD Card)is available or not
if FAT_FILE_SYSTEM==1 then will write and read files and it will compare the contents which has been written and read.
if FAT_FILE_SYSTEM==0 then it will write some string and read the string. then validate the written and read string.

briefdescription.para: To setup the necessary modules for the application.
